author: wglass
msg: Protect against NPE.  Issue reported and fix provided by Konstantin Pribluda.  VELOCITY-411.

author: wglass
msg: Throw more user-friendly exception when init() has not been called (as opposed to arbitrary NPE's from deep in the code)

author: wglass
msg: ParseErrorException now reports template name.  Thanks Malcolm Edgar!  VELOCITY-373.

author: imario
msg: enh: removed check for isWriteable in deleteSelf as its possible to delete a read-only file if you have write-execute access to the directory.
Thanks to Guillermo Vasconcelos for reporting it.
ftp-test: use passive mode by default
